data.meta_description: Watch the FC Oss vs Excelsior live stream video. Get live updates, predictions, H2H stats, and match insights. Eerste Divisie 09/08/2024.
data.text:
üìä Form Guide

FC Oss

WLLDLD

FC Oss head into this game following on from a 1-1 Eerste Divisie drawn match against NAC Breda.

In that game, FC Oss had 45% possession and 5 shots on goal with 3 on target. The scorer for FC Oss was Joshua Zimmerman (50'). NAC Breda had 12 shots on goal with 5 of them on target. Aim√© Omgba (30') scored for NAC Breda.

FC Oss have been conceding pretty frequently lately, but they‚Äôve also managed to score goals themselves. Looking at their last 6 games, FC Oss have seen their goal breached in 6 of them while also managing to get on the scoresheet in 6 of those matches.

Excelsior

WLWWLW

Excelsior will go into this match following on from a 4-1 Eerste Divisie Play-offs win with the defeat of NAC Breda in their most recent game.

In that game, Excelsior managed 69% possession and 19 shots on goal with 8 of them on target. The scorer for Excelsior was Troy Parrott (20', 35', 50'). NAC Breda got 7 attempts at goal with 3 of them on target. Boy Kemper (42' Own goal) and Casper Staring (58') scored for NAC Breda.

Illustrating their appetite for productive matches, goals have been celebrated 32 times in the previous six matches in which Excelsior have taken to the field, giving an average of 5.33 goals per fixture. Opposing teams have hit 13 from this total. Let‚Äôs find out whether or not that trend will be continued on into this next match.

‚ÜîÔ∏è Head to head

An examination of their most recent head-to-head meetings dating back to 25/04/2014 shows us that FC Oss have won 1 of them & Excelsior 4, with the number of drawn results being 1.

A sum of 14 goals were yielded between them in these games, with 3 for TOP Oss and 11 netted by Roodzwarten. That‚Äôs an average goals per game figure of 2.33.

The last league game featuring these clubs was Eerste Divisie match day 31 on 18/03/2022 when it ended FC Oss 1-1 Excelsior.

On that occasion, FC Oss had 45% possession and 13 shots at goal with 3 on target. Their only player on the scoresheet was Jearl Margaritha (77').

Excelsior got 19 shots at goal with 3 of them on target. Reuven Niemeijer (86') was the scorer.

The match was refereed by Erwin Blank.

üìã Team News: Excelsior

Excelsior manager Ruben den Uil has to currently contend with reduced team options. Kik Pierie (Foot injury), Lance Duijvestijn (Ankle surgery), Siem de Moes (unknown injury), Derensili Sanches Fernandes (Ankle injury) and Serano Seymor (Foot injury) won‚Äôt be making appearances.

‚ú® Prediction

We‚Äôre of the view that Excelsior will, in all probability, have the majority of the possession and should turn some of their chances into goals.

At the other end, FC Oss might well find it a difficult task getting goals although we reckon that they could well end up scoring here.

Therefore, we are anticipating a comfortable 1-3 winning score for Excelsior after 90 minutes.

Our expert partners are tipping over 1.5 goals for this match. Check out their VIP predictions here.

Renata Leite, 17:04 09/08/2024

Odds correct at time of publishing. All odds subject to change.
